08-15-2024: - Fixed T3 {AbilityIcon|Ability=Guided Owl|Size=20} Guided Owl not triggering correctly sometimes when the target has Spirit Armor
08-01-2024: - Added a new T3 Weapon Item, Pristine Emblem: Gives +25% Weapon Damage, +12 Spirit Power, and +12% {AbilityIcon|Ability=Spirit Armor|Size=20} Spirit Armor. When an enemy is above 50% HP, you deal an additional +25% Weapon Damage.
